item.title: Stay hungry, stay foolish
item.description: When starting a new phase in life, the excitement and passion is high as everything is fresh and full of possibilities. It is an unavoidable fact of life that we would face many difficulties, spend a lot of effort and become exhausted. If it is possible, I would take a screenshot in life to remember the moment where I was not so tired, not so jaded, and without the entitlement of feeling I deserve recognition.
